resources.string:
<style type="text/css">
table {
 border-collapse: collapse;
 border: 1px #fd8900 solid;
}
th {
 background-color: #fff300;
 color: #fd8900;
 border: 1px #fd8900 solid;
 text-transform: capitalize;
}
td {
 white-space: pre;
 border-right: 1px #fd8900 solid;
 padding-left: 5px;
 padding-right: 5px;
}
tr.even td {
 background-color:#ffffe1;
}
tr.odd td {
 background-color:#fff;
}
td.pass { 
 color:#0A0; 
 font-weight:bold;
}
td.fail { 
 color:#F00; 
 font-weight:bold;
}
</style>
